testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emily Roberts
items.comment: This tool saved my podcast! I couldn't believe how quickly it muted the noise from the cafe background.

items.name: James Parker
items.comment: As a music producer, the audio muting feature has become indispensable for keeping my tracks clean.

items.name: Linda Martinez
items.comment: The ease of use is incredible! I love that I can focus solely on my voice without any distractions.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our audio muting feature

items.title: What audio formats does WaveSpeed support?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI supports all popular audio formats, including MP3, WAV, and AAC. Simply upload your file for processing.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed free to use?
items.description: Yes, every user is granted 30 free credits daily, enabling you to enhance multiple audio files. Earn extra credits through user engagement on our platform.

items.title: Can I use the edited audio for professional projects?
items.description: Absolutely! Users with any subscription plan can utilize edited audio for commercial purposes, while free-tier users may use content for personal projects.

items.title: How is my audio privacy protected?
items.description: WaveSpeed processes all audio files on your device using advanced technologies, ensuring your data is never sent to external servers or stored anywhere.

footer.heading: Ready to Clean Up Your Audio?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience crystal clear sound. No sign-up required.
